name: Pacific Drive: Friendly Dumpster Customization Pack
summary:
The Friendly Dumpster has always been there for you. Proudly display your gratitude by decorating your station wagon with a pack of in-game trash themed cosmetic items.

In this pack you’ll find:
Re-Cycled Steering Wheel
Decal Kit: Dumpster Devotee
Gift Shifter
Air Trashener (Mirror Ornament)
Dumpster Idol (Bobblehead)
Cuddle Can (Antenna Topper)
